name: Trax Dynia
flavor_text: A modified weapon from the Last City.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Ranged scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifle Scope ST

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor
